In England, in the seven days to 17 March, there were 31,991 new confirmed cases (56.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 March, there were 33,093 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (1,102 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 March is 3,764,026 (6,687.2 cases per 100,000 population).
